page.title: 17Population
page.content: We estimate the population of the block to be 1200.Of these 900 live in Preesall,and the majority of these live in 3 areas,(i)on or between Sandy Lane and Park Lane,(ii)on the Rosemount estate, or (iii) on or near Pilling Lane. Those living in Pilling live on Smallwood Hey,Wheel Lane,Duck Street or in isolated farms or cottages. The movement of population tends to be into the area with a tendency for some people retiring and settling down in Preesall near to the sea and in a place where house prices are reasonable and where they enjoyed days out from the inland Lancashire towns.In our survey a quarter of those interviewed had come on those terms.In summer the population is increased by the influx of holiday "caravanners" to the 4 sites (possibly as many as 200 people).
